definition: interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)

sentences.english: Aiya, then what is afternoon meal?
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，那午餐有什麼喫呀？

sentences.english: Oh great, she probably thinks I'm stuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，她很可能認爲我是個狂傲自大的傢伙。

sentences.english: Wow, no wonder locals say water is the soul of Kanas.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，都說水是喀納斯的靈魂。

sentences.english: Well, the photo doesn'￡come out at all.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，這張照菏根本浚擯出來。

sentences.english: Oho, you are a true partner.
Years Ah soon as fell to the ground, Chung Boy agony Nazei.
sentences.chinese: 萬年哎呀一聲倒在地上，衆童子急呼拿賊。

sentences.english: Joni: Oh, this bag of fertilizer is so heavy.
Oh, you should have tasted the white chocolate cake she made last week.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，你真是應該嚐嚐上星期她做的白巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.english: Lumme , I don't like this job.
"Oh, " says Alvah sitting up glad, "and what else?
sentences.chinese: “哎呀，”端坐着的阿爾瓦高興說，“還有什麼？”
哎呀，中國又一次贏過美國了？

sentences.english: Alas, it’s not always like this.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，這並不一直是這樣。

sentences.english: She responded, "Why, yes, I do know you Mr. Williams.
sentences.chinese: 大媽回答，“哎呀，當然認識，你是威廉先生。

sentences.english: B:Oh, it's too far to walk there. We can take a bus.
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，太遠了，走着去不了，我們可以坐公共汽車。

definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
